column2: stormfan, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: Nothing I have tried since this was taken off the market has worked as well and that goes for my Mom too. She suffers very badly with rheumatoid arthritis and this was the only thing she could take with her other health problems. It is a shame a few people with other issues that could cause the problems have to screw this up for everyone else.

column2: MAD AS HELL, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I was able to get straight out of bed every morning! It was my miracle pill! I hate you for pulling it off the shelf! If it truly works you take it away from us!! BRING IT BACK! I could function! I took 20mg every day, and for over 4 months I was taking 30 mg every other day no improvements, just that my DR was trying to help with something else (that didnt work) Now I am back to slowly trying to ache my way out of the bed and trying to make my way to the bathroom (I am 39 and look like a 90 yr old!) It takes me a good hour to 2 hours to get my joints moving to halfway function for the day! Thanks for pulling it off the shelf you JERKS! BRING IT BACK !!!!!!! BRING IT BACK !!!!!!! column2: anonymous, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: Years of diffculty walking due to arthritis prevented me from the exercise needed to help my diabetes type 2.The day after I started Bextra I was able to walk with no knee or hip pain,& never had a single side effect.A miracle for me.When FDA decided to take it off market,the pain & difficulty moving came back.Other NSAID's have bad effects for me & don't work.Nothing else comes close!Governments should back off & let people & their doctors take responsiblity for themselves.
